TypeSignature.Value: public interface ILSSerializer : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract ILSSerializer implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type ILSSerializer = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: A LSSerializer provides an API for serializing (writing) a DOM document out into XML.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Write (Org.W3c.Dom.INode nodeArg, Org.W3c.Dom.LS.ILSOutput destination);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Write(class Org.W3c.Dom.INode nodeArg, class Org.W3c.Dom.LS.ILSOutput destination) cil managed
abstract member Write : Org.W3c.Dom.INode * Org.W3c.Dom.LS.ILSOutput -> bool

Docs.param: The destination for the serialized DOM.
Docs.summary: Serialize the specified node as described above in the general description of the LSSerializer interface.
Docs.returns: Returns true if node was successfully serialized. Return false in case the normal processing stopped but the implementation kept serializing the document; the result of the serialization being implementation dependent then.

Docs.summary: A convenience method that acts as if <code>LSSerializer.
Docs.returns: Returns true if node was successfully serialized. Return false in case the normal processing stopped but the implementation kept serializing the document; the result of the serialization being implementation dependent then.
